description: After finishing a conversation with Giovanni`s secretary, Yamask appeared and was sniffing a tin of Pokémon food that was in Team Rocket`s briefcase. Lighthearted as usual, James quickly offed the Yamask some food which it quickly ate. Fascinated by the Yamask, James asked it if it wished to travel with him which it agreed and captured itself into James` Poké Ball.
name: Deathmas (Kojirou)
